Course Name: ACG 3024 - ACCOUNTING FOR MANAGERS AND INVESTORS (NON-MAJORS)
Prerequisites: HIGHER LEVEL MATH WITH A GRADE OF C OR HIGHER.
Course Description: THIS COURSE ADDRESSES THE USE OF ACCOUNTING INFORMATION BY NON-FINANCIAL MANAGERS.  EMPHASIS IS PLACED ON THE INTERPRETATION OF ACCOUNTING INFORMATION AND THE LANGUAGE OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING TO EFFECTIVELY PARTICIPATE IN ACTIVITIES SUCH AS PLANNING, INVESTMENT, CONTROL, AND MANAGERIAL DECISION MAKING.
Textbook(s): EDMONDS, OLDS, MCNAIR, AND TSAY. SURVEY OF ACCOUNTING WITH CONNECT PLUS. LOOSE LEAF. MCGRAW-HILL. ISBN: 1259184854/9781259184857. 4TH EDITION.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
